channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: EST Rapid Roundup: How Will the Supreme Court’s IEEPA Ruling Impact U.S.-China Tech Competition?
item.description: CSIS Economic Security and Technology Department experts explored how the SCOTUS tariffs decision will affect energy markets, long-term innovation policy, and the technology competition with China.

item.title: The Supreme Court’s IEEPA Tariff Ruling and What Comes Next
item.description: This week, Bill Reinsch discusses the implications of the Supreme Court ruling that the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) does not permit tariffs.
